    • Constructor Detail

      • HourlyProfessor

        public HourlyProfessor(java.lang.String firstName,
                       java.lang.String lastName,
                       java.lang.String id,
                       double baseSalary,
                       int workedHours)

        HourlyProfessor

        Description: Constructs a new HourlyProfessor object with the provided information. This constructor initializes a new HourlyProfessor object with the specified first name, last name, ID, base salary, and worked hours.

        Preconditions:

        • firstName must be a String.
        • lastName must be a String.
        • id must be a String.
        • baseSalary must be a double.
        • workedHours must be an int.

        Postconditions:

        • A new HourlyProfessor object is created with the specified first name, last name, ID, base salary, and worked hours.
        • The total salary of the hourly professor is calculated based on the provided base salary and worked hours, using the calcTotalSalary() method.
        • The total salary of the hourly professor is set using Professor.setTotalSalary(double) method from the superclass.
        Parameters:
        firstName - The first name of the hourly professor.
        lastName - The last name of the hourly professor.
        id - The ID of the hourly professor.
        baseSalary - The base salary of the hourly professor.
        workedHours - The number of hours worked by the hourly professor.

    • Method Detail

      • calcTotalSalary

        public double calcTotalSalary()

        calcTotalSalary

        Description: Calculates the total salary of the hourly professor based on the base salary and the number of worked hours. The base salary is accessed using Professor.getBaseSalary()

        Preconditions:

        • baseSalary must be a double.
        • workedHours must be an int.

        Postconditions:

        • The total salary of the hourly professor is calculated and returned.
        Specified by:
        calcTotalSalary in class Professor
        Returns:
        The total salary of the hourly professor.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Professor

      • getWorkedHours

        public int getWorkedHours()

        getWorkedHours

        Description: Retrieves the number of hours worked by the hourly professor.

        Preconditions:

        • The HourlyProfessor instance cannot be null.

        Postconditions:

        • The number of hours worked by the hourly professor is returned.
        Returns:
        The number of hours worked by the hourly professor.

      • setWorkedHours

        public void setWorkedHours(int workedHours)

        setWorkedHours

        Description: Sets the number of hours worked by the hourly professor.

        Preconditions:

        • The HourlyProfessor instance cannot be null.
        • workedHours must be an int.

        Postconditions:

        • The number of hours worked by the hourly professor is updated to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        workedHours - The new number of hours worked by the hourly professor.
